text: Whyanbeelia is a genus of plants under the family Picrodendraceae described as a genus in 1976.Airy Shaw, Herbert Kenneth & Hyland, Bernard Patrick Matthew. 1976. Kew Bulletin 31: 375-376.Tropicos, Whyanbeelia Airy Shaw & B. Hyland There is only one known species, Whyanbeelia terrae-reginae, endemic to the Cook region of the Australian State of Queensland.Kew World Checklist of Selected Plant Families The epithet "terrae-reginae" is Latin for "from the land of the queen." ==References== Category:Picrodendraceae Category:Flora of Queensland Category:Monotypic Malpighiales genera Category:Taxa named by Bernard Hyland
title: Whyanbeelia
